p: ALX was prepared in fresh normal saline. Diabetes was induced by intraperitoneal (ip) injection of alloxan monohydrate (150 mg/kg bwt) in a volume of 3 mL [ 28]. After 72 h, blood was withdrawn for blood glucose estimation monitored with a glucometer (Fine-test®, Infopia Diagnostics). The animals with ≥250 mg/dl blood glucose levels were considered diabetic and included in the experiment [ 29]. The diabetic animals were randomly distributed into three groups of eight animals each while the last group, the positive control, had eight normal rats ( Table 1).
